description:
It’s the end of the road for “Workaholics.” The Comedy Central series will wrap up after its seventh season, which premieres in January 2017, Variety has confirmed.美剧《工作狂》被砍了！Variety已证实Comedy Central已经圆满完成了《工作狂》第七季的制作，本剧将在2017年1月首播。

The show was created by Blake Anderson, Adam DeVine, Anders Holm, Kyle Newacheck, Connor Pritchard and Dominic Russo, and stars Anderson, DeVine, Holm and Newacheck.本剧由Blake Anderson，Adam DeVine，Anders Holm，Kyle Newacheck，Connor Pritchard和Dominic Russo创作，由Anderson，DeVine，Holm和Newacheck担任主演。

News of “Workaholics” ending comes after many rumors that the cast would be moving onto other projects, following Season 7. Holm is set to star in a series in development at Fox. DeVine has had a successful foray into film with comedies, including the “Pitch Perfect” franchise, “Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates” and more.《工作狂》将结束的新闻，是在很多类似剧组将在第七季之后拍摄其他作品的传言之后宣布的。像是，Holm将出演Fox的剧作。DeVine成功进军喜剧电影界，包括《完美音调》、《网聘女伴》等。

In other news, “Vampire Diaries” alum Nina Dobrev announced on social media that she will guest star on Season 7 of “Workaholics.”另外，《吸血鬼日记》女主角妮娜杜波夫在社交媒体上宣布将客串《工作狂》第七季。

title: 《吸血鬼日记》女主客串《工作狂》最后一季第七季
